roleset.name: cut transversly, dividing by cutting transversely
roleset.note: TRANSECT-V NOTES: Based on sgh-pa data. No comparison. Framed by Katie. (from transect.01-v)

example.name: arg 1 only (most common)
example.text: [Ducts in the deeper areas-1] are transected [*-1]at the edges of the biopsy
example.arg: at the edges of the biopsy

example.name: arg 1 again
example.text: [Tumor-1] appears to be transected [*-1]at the yellow lateral

example.name: Noun usage
example.text: Two great polar explorers, Nansen and Peary, the former at the time of his transection of the icecap in 1888, and the latter...
